Class StaticObject

java.lang.Object
LayeredObject
SimulationObject
StaticObject
public class StaticObject extends SimulationObject
This is a template for static objects in simulations, i.e. buildings.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private Color
    color
    The colour used if imgMode is false.
    private String
    filePath
    Link to the image file the object is to display, if there is one.
    private int
    height
    A dimension of the Static Object
    private BufferedImage
    img
    The image to be displayed, if imgMode is true.
    private boolean
    imgMode
    If true, the object displays an image.
    private int
    width
    A dimension of the Static Object

  • Field Details

    • imgMode

      private boolean imgMode
      If true, the object displays an image. Otherwise, it displays a colour.

    • filePath

      private String filePath
      Link to the image file the object is to display, if there is one.

    • color

      private Color color
      The colour used if imgMode is false.

    • width

      private int width
      A dimension of the Static Object

    • height

      private int height
      A dimension of the Static Object

    • img

      private BufferedImage img
      The image to be displayed, if imgMode is true.

  • Constructor Details

    • StaticObject

      public StaticObject(String i, String filePath, int layer, int x, int y, int width, int height)
      Class constructor using an Image.
      Parameters:
      i - Identifier
      filePath - File path to the image to be displayed
      layer - Local layer within the simulation
      x - X-position according to the mainFrame
      y - Y-position according to the mainFrame
      width - The Static Object's width
      height - The Static Object's height

    • StaticObject

      public StaticObject(String i, Color color, int layer, int x, int y, int width, int height)
      Class constructor using a Colour.
      Parameters:
      i - Identifier
      color - Colour to be used
      layer - Local layer within the simulation
      x - X-position according to the mainFrame
      y - Y-position according to the mainFrame
      width - The Static Object's width
      height - The Static Object's height
